title: Republicans attack ‘woke’ Netflix — and ignore YouTube
full_text:
Republicans attack ‘woke’ Netflix — and ignore YouTube. When Netflix co-CEO Ted Sarandos entered the Senate office building on Tuesday, he got thrown a curveball. What started as a standard antitrust hearing relating to the Warner Bros. merger quickly devolved into a performative Republican attack about the spread….
A malicious and misguided culture war continues. A malicious and misguided culture war continues. by Emma RothClose Posts from this author will be added to y… [+5498 chars]
